node.title: Auckland Maserati driver charged over alleged hit and run
node.description: A woman in her 40s will face court.
node.content: ["The driver of a Maserati allegedly involved in a hit and run in Auckland earlier this year has been charged.\n", "Police said the hit and run happened on the night of July 8, at the intersection of Great South Road and Greenlane East.\u00a0", "The victim, who was knocked unconscious and sustained leg injuries, was on a motorbike waiting to turn right when the Maserati driver hit them before fleeing, police said.", "\"A woman in her 40s faces a number of charges in relation to this incident including careless driving causing injury,\" a police spokeswoman confirmed to Newshub.", "The woman was due to appear in court on Wednesday, the spokeswoman said.\u00a0\u00a0"]
